pylayers.signal.bsignal.FUsignal.energy¶

FUsignal.energy(axis=0)[source]¶

calculate energy along given axis

Parameters :axis : (default 0)

Examples

>>> e   = EnImpulse()
>>> En1 = e.energy()
>>> E   = e.esd()
>>> En2 = E.energy()
>>> assert((En1>0.99) & (En1<1.01))
